column4: Can anyone reccomend an easily installed mp3 player for Ubuntu?
make sure you have the correct driver selected
Im a linux newbie. What do you mean the correct driver selected?
I get this error message when I typed './configure' - "configure: error: *** GLIB >= 1.2.2 not installed - please install first ***
grab glib and also build-essential in synaptic, then also do updatedb then try to compile
it shows that glib is already installed
I searched for glib and all matching entries are installed
I get this warning when I type 'sudo updatedb' : warning: updatedb: could not open database: /var/lib/slocate/slocate.db: No such file or directory
I still get the following error when trying ti compile xmms after doing your steps: configure: error: *** GLIB >= 1.2.2 not installed - please install first ***
